net.adamcin.oakpal.maven.mojo

Class OpearPackageMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • net.adamcin.oakpal.maven.mojo.OpearPackageMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MojoWithCommonParams, MojoWithRepositoryParams, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="opear-package",
      requiresDependencyResolution=RUNTIME_PLUS_SYSTEM,
      configurator="oakpal",
      defaultPhase=PACKAGE)
public class OpearPackageMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Bundles up project dependencies an exported plans as an opear (OakPAL Encapsulated Archive) file, and attaches it to the project.
    Since:
    1.4.0
